channel.title: Chronomancer Delay Bug
channel.description:
#### What happened?
I was Chronomancer. I was bled on n3. I had no delays. N4 passes just fine. On n5, I was healed AND another chrono delayed me. I only saw the heal. n6 passes just fine. N7 I died from chrono delay.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
N7 - I lived
#### Steps to reproduce:
Bleed a chrono, have a healer heal them and a chrono delay them on the night the bleed would take effect.
#### Comments:
ToL Rulez!

item.title: Chronomancer Delay Bug
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
Normally, Heal would come first then Delay.
You just met a rare bug, and that seem to be unfixable.

Read full topic

item.title: Chronomancer Delay Bug
item.dc:creator: Sharvax
item.description:
What happened?

I was Chronomancer. I was bled on n3. I had no delays. N4 passes just fine.
On n5, I was healed AND another chrono delayed me. I only saw the heal.
n6 passes just fine. N7 I died from chrono delay.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

N7 - I lived

Steps to reproduce:

Bleed a chrono, have a healer heal them and a chrono delay them on the night the bleed would take effect.

Comments:
